name: WaterDOOR
description:
You need to water your plants, but you don't have enough water?

Play a game!

Based on a known math problem.

Licensed under Apache 2.0.

You can find source code here: https://github.com/Gleefre/waterdoor

Note that windows release might not working, probably because of yours OpenGL drivers.

This game is "working on my computer", if you are unable to run it or if you encounter various bugs, please create an issue on github repository.
